# PNG images (kids & school)

Place your PNG images here. Used by the site:

- `kids-classroom.png` – Hero / learning scene
- `kids-playing.png` – Play / gallery
- `school-building.png` – Location / gallery
- `classroom-activity.png` – Experience / animated-style section

For animated PNGs (APNG), use the same filenames or add e.g. `hero-animated.png` and reference in code. All assets should be PNG format.
